00021 void AP_EEPromRegistry::add(AP_EEPromEntry * entry, uint16_t & id, uint16_t & address, size_t size)
00022 {
00023         if (_newAddress + size > _maxSize) return;
00024         address = _newAddress;
00025         _newAddress += size;
00026         id = _newId++;
00027         push_back(entry);
00028 }
